snippet: Xuedan Wang worked at Harper's Bazaar four months without pay, putting in 40-hour workweeks. In such cases, her lawyers argue, interns are doing the jobs of entry-level workers, without being compensated.
abstract: Xuedan Wang worked at Harper's Bazaar four months without pay, putting in 40-hour workweeks. In such cases, her lawyers argue, interns are doing the jobs of entry-level workers, without being compensated.

headline.main: Former Intern Sues Hearst Over Unpaid Work and Hopes to Create a Class Action
